title: Visualization Journal
text:
2 Week 1

2.1 Notes





2.2 Visualization
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    title = "Horsepower vs. MPG",
    x = "Miles per gallon (mpg)",
    y = "Horsepower (hp)"
  )

title: Visualization Journal
text:
3 Week 2

3.1 Notes





3.2 Visualization


Show code
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.DataFrame({
    "x": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
    "y": [2, 1, 3, 5, 4],
})

plt.figure()
plt.plot(df["x"], df["y"], marker="o")
plt.title("Simple Line Plot")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("y")
plt.show()

title: Visualization Journal
text:
4 Week 3

4.1 Notes





4.2 Visualization
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

summary_tbl <- mtcars %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarize(
    avg_mpg = mean(mpg),
    n = n(),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

ggplot(summary_tbl, aes(x = factor(cyl), y = avg_mpg)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(
    title = "Average MPG by Cylinder Count",
    x = "Cylinders",
    y = "Average MPG"
  )
